title: Tomodachi Dakedo Oishisou
description:
Takatora Mamiya, a huge otaku with a pretty face, and Chihiro Yuki, who is a cheerful and talkative pizza deliveryman. The two, who have nothing in common, became friends. But, Takatora gets turned on by Chihiro's smile and body temperature...
"Why didn't you pull out?!"
The ending of the sex life hack of two polar opposites is...!

Along with is a compilation of a midsummer of sweaty sex with a sadistic professor x a lewd doggie college student, and test of courage sex between psychic college students.
